revapm.user_verify_subject: RevAPM New User Email Verification Request
revapm.password_reset_confirmation_email_subjec: Your RevAPM Customer Portal password has been changed
revapm.signup_user_verify_email_subject: RevAPM New User Email Verification Request
signup_user_verify_email_text:
Hello,

You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) have requested the creation of a RevAPM account.
Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:
{{vendorUrl}}/#/profile/verify/{{tokenPlace}}
If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
Should you have any questions please contact us 24x7 at {{supportEmail}}.
Kind regards,
RevAPM Customer Support Team
http://www.revapm.com/
signup_user_verify_email_html: You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) have requested the creation of a RevAPM account.
If you did not request this, please ignore this email.
Should you have any questions please contact us 24x7 at {{supportEmail}}.
chargify_user_welcome_email_text:
Hello {{firstname}},

We've completed setting up your new RevAPM account!
Your are welcome to visit our customer portal at {{portalUrl}}
and start managing your configuration!
Should you have any questions please contact us 24x7 at {{supportEmail}}
Kind regards,
RevAPM Customer Support Team
http://www.revapm.com/
password_reset_email_text:
Hello,

You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account.
Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:
{{resetPasswordUrl}}/#/password/reset/{{token}}
If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
Should you have any questions please contact us 24x7 at {{supportEmail}} .
Kind regards,
RevAPM Customer Support Team
http://www.revapm.com/
password_reset_confirmation_email_text:
Hello,

This is a confirmation that the password for your account {{email}} has just been changed.
Should you have any questions please contact us 24x7 at {{supportEmail}} 
Kind regards,
RevAPM Customer Support Team
http://www.revapm.com/
